data.question: What is the empirical formula of the as-grown [ZnF(AmTAZ)]·Solvents?
At what temperature does the framework of [ZnF(AmTAZ)]·solvents maintain its integrity?
What is the resulting product when [ZnF(AmTAZ)]·solvents is heated in air to 800 °C?
Is the original crystal shape maintained during the solid-state transformation of [ZnF(AmTAZ)]·solvents?
What is the coordination geometry of Zn2+ centers in [ZnF(AmTAZ)]·solvents?
What happens to [ZnF(AmTAZ)]·solvents when heated in an inert atmosphere?
data.answer: It is converted to zinc cyanamide (ZnCN2)

data.question: Does the framework of [ZnF(AmTAZ)]·solvents contain intersecting channels?
What is the effect of the amino group of the AmTAZ ligand on the channels of [ZnF(AmTAZ)]·solvents?
data.answer: It reduces the effective diameter of the tubes

data.question: What is the solvent-accessible volume percentage of the [ZnF(AmTAZ)]·solvents framework?
Can the guest solvent molecules in [ZnF(AmTAZ)]·solvents be replaced by other small solvent molecules?
What is the role of the 2-positioned nitrogen donor of each AmTAZ ligand in the structure of [ZnF(AmTAZ)]·solvents?
data.answer: It is bound to one of the six Zn2+ centers belonging to an adjacent, eclipsing hexanuclear metallamacrocycle

data.question: What is the result of heating [ZnF(AmTAZ)]·solvents in helium after a 2-hour purge period?
Are the channels of [ZnF(AmTAZ)]·solvents hydrophilic or hydrophobic?
Is the thermal stability of [ZnF(AmTAZ)]·solvents higher than most known frameworks?
What is the effect of the reaction conditions on the crystal morphology of [ZnF(AmTAZ)]·solvents?
data.answer: The crystal morphology and the particle size of the product can be controlled

data.question: Does the [ZnF(AmTAZ)]·solvents framework decompose upon removal of guest molecules at temperatures up to 375 °C?
What is the significance of the compact tubular topology of the [ZnF(AmTAZ)]·solvents framework?
data.answer: It contributes to the framework's features such as high robustness, thermal stability, and the ability to transform into shape-preserved ZnO or ZnCN2

data.question: Can the size of ZnO or ZnCN2 rods be fixed by the size of the metal−organic precursor crystals?
What is the potential application of ZnO formed from [ZnF(AmTAZ)]·solvents?
data.answer: It can be used in nanodevices due to its electronic, acoustic, and optical properties

data.question: Is the amino group of the AmTAZ ligand expected to create a more hydrophobic inner environment in the channels of [ZnF(AmTAZ)]·solvents?
